Coding Journey

I began programming in college and fell in love with the challenge it presented in regards to problem-solving. I'm still gaining experience in the making of web applications. It hasn't been easy, by any means. Technology is always evolving, and so one must do so with it. However, this also means that our capabilities simultaneously evolve.

Professional Hobbyist

I excel at drawing all over my notes and being incapable of reading them later. Regretfully, the best of my work ends up on lined paper. I also enjoy breathing in sushi in addition to the fresh air outside. When I'm not doing either of those things, I'm probably swooning over a video game on my wishlist and awaiting a sale.
